name: The Executive Lite
description:
Full version is 40% OFF for a VERY LIMITED TIME!!!

Flame kick werewolves, perform thrilling acrobatic stunts, and run a trillion dollar mining company in Riverman Media’s combat-action masterpiece!

Play 10 levels of the iOS megahit The Executive for FREE, then transfer your progress automatically to the FULL VERSION!

From the creators of the award-winning “Pizza Vs. Skeletons” comes The Executive: a fast-paced, cinematic, martial arts action game designed from the ground up for iPhone and iPad. You are the CEO of a company that has been infiltrated by werewolves, and it’s your job to save your employees, and eventually the entire city, from their dastardly schemes.

FEATURES

+ 10 levels, hand-crafted one pixel at a time (120 in the full version)
+ Several special moves and skills to learn (dozens in the full version)
+ Battle enemies and execute stunts in every level
+ Many unique enemies, each with their own behavior (over 50 in the full version)
+ Invest in your mining company and earn money continuously
+ 12 Challenging achievements, shared with the full version
+ A surprising and difficult final boss
+ High-definition “Retina” graphics for all supported devices and Retina HD graphics on iPhone 6+ in the Full Version

Note: To ensure that your progress is properly transfered to the Full Version, The Executive, leave this version installed before running the Full Version for the first time.
